data.title: Explosion in Tel Aviv Following Missile Strike
data.description: A missile strike resulted in a loud explosion in Tel Aviv, Israel, on the 28th, local reports indicate. According to NS3.AI, the incident has raised concerns among residents and authorities. As of now, there are no details available regarding damages or casualties.

data.title: Wells Fargo Refuses To Reimburse Customer After Scammer Drains $18,000 From Account, Finding ‘No Evidence of Fraud’: Report
data.description:
Wells Fargo has denied a customer’s plea for reimbursement after a scammer drained $18,000 from his account, according to a new report. Virginia resident William Sroufe lost more than $18,000 on December 17th in a phone scam where the caller impersonated Wells Fargo, reports the local news outlet WWBT.
source: https://dailyhodl.com/2026/02/28/wells-fargo-refuses-to-reimburse-customer-after-scammer-drains-18000-from-account-finding-no-evidence-of-fraud-report/

data.title: Wells Fargo Customer Loses $18,000 in Phone Scam
data.description: A Wells Fargo customer in Virginia fell victim to a phone scam, losing $18,000 after a caller impersonated the bank and manipulated the victim into authorizing transfers. According to NS3.AI, despite the suspicious circumstances and the victim's assertion that authorization was obtained through deception, Wells Fargo declined to reimburse the loss, citing a lack of evidence of fraud. This incident highlights the difficulties consumers encounter with bank fraud protection, particularly when cryptocurrency references are involved.

data.title: An Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman said Iran's Supreme Leader and President are "safe and sound."
data.description: Iranian Foreign Ministry spokesman Baghae said on the evening of February 28 that Iran's Supreme Leader Khamenei and President Pezechzian were both "safe and sound." Baghae made this statement in separate interviews with ABC and Sky News.

data.title: Cardano Faces Selling Pressure Amid Tightening Range
data.description: Cardano's price is currently consolidating within a narrowing range, experiencing ongoing selling pressure. According to NS3.AI, this is evident in the Money Flow Index and futures market data. Long-term holders are playing a crucial role by retaining older coins, which is helping ADA maintain the 13.6% Fibonacci retracement support around $0.256. If this support level fails, Cardano could see further declines toward $0.239. Conversely, a successful defense might lead to a rebound, testing resistance near $0.295.

data.title: A huge explosion was heard in Tel Aviv, Israel.
data.description: A massive explosion was heard in Tel Aviv, Israel, on the 28th local time. It is reported that a missile crashed in Tel Aviv.

data.title: The Iranian Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps issued a statement saying that there were numerous US military casualties in Kuwait.
data.description: At 1:00 AM local time on March 1st, the Iranian Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) issued Announcement No. 4. The announcement stated that in the fifth wave of "True Commitment 4," a US warship transporting ammunition in Jebel Ali, UAE, was attacked by four drones, losing power and exploding. Additionally, a US naval base in Kuwait was attacked by four ballistic missiles and twelve drones, destroying all infrastructure and causing numerous US casualties. Furthermore, an MST-class combat support ship transporting fuel in the Indian Ocean was attacked by Iranian missiles. The IRGC's public relations department also announced that the Prince Sultan Air Base in Saudi Arabia was targeted by Iranian missiles and drones. The IRGC also announced that the Khalil military base in Iraq was attacked by missiles. The IRGC stated that US special forces and commandos are stationed at this base.

data.title: BREAKING: US President Donald Trump Confirms Death of Iran’s Supreme Leader Khamenei
data.description:
According to breaking news, US President Donald Trump has confirmed the death of Iranian religious leader Ali Khamenei. Trump made the following statement: “Khamenei is dead, now is Iran’s greatest chance to reclaim its country. ” Continue Reading: BREAKING: US President Donald Trump Confirms Death of Iran’s Supreme Leader Khamenei
source: https://en.bitcoinsistemi.com/breaking-us-president-donald-trump-confirms-death-of-iran-s-supreme-leader-khamenei/

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | U.S. President Trump Comments on Iranian Forces' Alleged War Fatigue
data.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has stated that he has heard reports suggesting that many members of Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, military, and other security and police forces are reportedly weary of conflict and are seeking exemptions from the United States. According to Jin10, these remarks come amid ongoing tensions between the U.S. and Iran, highlighting the complex geopolitical dynamics in the region. The situation remains fluid as both nations navigate their diplomatic and military strategies.

data.title: Military Strikes on Iran Lead to Significant Trading on Polymarket
data.description: Military actions by the United States and Israel against Iran over the weekend have led to a surge in trading activity on Polymarket, a prediction market platform. Bloomberg posted on X that contracts related to the timing of these strikes saw a trading volume of $529 million. This development highlights the intersection of geopolitical events and financial markets, as traders sought to capitalize on the unfolding situation.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | Iran's Revolutionary Guard Announces New Wave of Attacks
data.description: Iran's Revolutionary Guard has declared plans to initiate a new series of attacks aimed at 'expanding and deepening the war.' According to Jin10, this announcement signals a potential escalation in regional tensions. The move comes amid ongoing geopolitical conflicts, raising concerns about the stability in the Middle East. The Revolutionary Guard's statement did not specify the targets or the timeline for these attacks, leaving the international community on high alert. Observers are closely monitoring the situation for further developments.

data.title: European Union Utilizes Minipigs to Strengthen Biotech Sector
data.description: Minipigs are becoming increasingly significant in the European Union's efforts to bolster its biotech industry. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting their ease of breeding and cost-effectiveness as major advantages. These animals are being integrated into research and development processes, contributing to the EU's goal of enhancing resilience in the biotech sector. The use of minipigs is seen as a strategic move to advance scientific research and innovation within the region.

data.title: UN Secretary-General Regrets Missed Diplomatic Opportunities on Iran Issue
data.description: The United Nations Secretary-General has expressed deep regret over the missed diplomatic opportunities concerning the Iran issue. According to ChainCatcher, the Secretary-General also addressed recent reports, clarifying that there is no confirmation regarding the death of Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

data.title: President Trump's Approach to Iran Raises Concerns Over Trust
data.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's recent actions towards Iran have sparked debate over the level of trust he expects from the American public and the international community. New York Times posted on X, highlighting the editorial board's perspective that President Trump is demanding blind trust without having earned it. The board argues that such an approach could have significant implications for U.S. foreign policy and global relations. The editorial suggests that transparency and accountability are crucial in maintaining trust and credibility on the world stage. As tensions with Iran continue, the need for clear communication and justified actions becomes increasingly important.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | Iranian Drone Attack Prompts Evacuation at Dubai International Airport
data.description: An Iranian drone attack has reportedly targeted Dubai International Airport, leading to evacuation efforts. According to Jin10, the incident has raised concerns about regional security and the potential impact on international travel. Authorities are currently managing the situation, ensuring the safety of passengers and staff. The geopolitical tensions in the region continue to escalate, affecting various sectors, including aviation and tourism.

data.title: U.S. Payroll Growth Expected to Moderate in February
data.description: U.S. payroll growth is anticipated to have slowed in February following a robust hiring surge in the previous month. Bloomberg posted on X, indicating that the labor market is likely returning to a more sustainable pace. This adjustment comes after the strongest month of hiring in a year, suggesting a stabilization in employment trends. The moderation in job growth reflects a potential balance in the labor market, aligning with broader economic conditions.

data.title: Polymarket Data Shows Surge in Probability of Khamenei Stepping Down
data.description: The probability of Iranian Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei stepping down by March 31 has sharply increased, according to Polymarket data. According to ChainCatcher, the likelihood of this event occurring has surged to 93%, marking an 85 percentage point rise. The total market trading volume has reached $30.43 million.

data.title: Gulf Nations to Convene Following Iranian Attack
data.description: Gulf countries are set to hold a meeting tomorrow in response to a recent attack by Iran. According to Jin10, the gathering aims to address the implications of the incident and discuss potential measures to ensure regional stability. The attack has heightened tensions in the area, prompting leaders to seek collaborative solutions. The meeting underscores the urgency of addressing security concerns and fostering diplomatic dialogue among the affected nations.

data.title: Oil holds as Khamenei death reports, 'Epic Fury' cited
data.description:
Officials detail conflicting reports on Ayatollah Ali Khamenei death as CENTCOM shares 'Operation Epic Fury' footage; analysis outlines Iran’s succession rules.
source: https://coincu.com/news/oil-holds-as-khamenei-death-reports-epic-fury-cited/

data.title: Bitcoin's Future Price Influenced by AI's Economic Impact
data.description: Bitcoin's future price trajectory is increasingly influenced by artificial intelligence's impact on economic growth, employment, interest rates, and central bank liquidity, according to NS3.AI. NYDIG Research highlights that AI-related job disruptions may affect real interest rates and liquidity conditions, indirectly fueling demand for Bitcoin. This represents a shift from Bitcoin's traditional reliance on technological factors to broader macroeconomic influences associated with AI development.
